scripts.predeploy: yarn run compile:js && yarn run compile:css
scripts.compile:js: babel scripts.js -o scripts.min.js --minified && uglifyjs scripts.min.js -o scripts.min.js -m
scripts.compile:css: stylus styles.styl && postcss -u autoprefixer cssnano -c ~/.autoprefixer.json styles.css -o styles.min.css --no-map
